name: Loading... (nielsaoe)
description:
Loading... is a small unfinished puzzle game. All you need to play this game is a mouse or a touchpad. It's a puzzle game, so you have to figure out how it works.

It was created during Nordic Game Jam  2021 by Niels Østman.

3rd party assets used:

  • https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/415510/
  • https://freesound.org/people/marcel_farres/sounds/186104/
